Name: Spoons.Bubbles
Description:
Allows users to have customisable dome shield colours!* 
 
 To set a colour manually**, type "AddCustomBubble <r> <g> <b>" 
 Example: "AddCustomBubble 255 0 255" 
 (This is useful for finding a colour that you like) 
 
 To automatically set your colour when you join a server, go to 
 .../R2Northstar/mods/Spoons.Bubbles/mod/cfg/autoexec_spoons_bubbles.cfg 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 *your custom colour will only function if the server is also running the mod 
 **a colour set this way will be reset when the match ends
